name: TaxAct 2016 Tax Return File
summary: Learn about .TA6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since annual tax returns are filed for the previous year, the TA6 file is commonly created in 2017 from the beginning of January to April 15. A TA6 file can be saved by the desktop version of TaxAct or exported from TaxAct Online. Once you have completed a tax return, you can either print and mail in the tax forms or file electronically.
TA6 files prepared by TaxAct desktop users (Free Federal, Basic, Plus, and Premium) are located in the "TaxAct2016" folder in your "My Documents" folder.

If you are worried about your tax return becoming corrupt or getting lost you can create a backup of your tax return select File â†’ Backup... and name your file. A backup tax return will be created and saved as a .BA6 file. It is important to note that you must save your tax return before creating your backup.
NOTE: The TA6 file replaced the .TA5 file, which is used for 2015 tax returns created by the 2016 version of TaxAct.

description: A TA6 file is a 2016 tax return created with the 2016 version of TaxAct, a tax-preparation program. It contains tax data for the 2016 tax year, which includes both federal IRS tax forms and state forms for a specific state. TA6 files also store the user's basic information such as name, date of birth, occupation, marital status, dependents, and social security number.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ta6 file in TaxAct 2016
images.caption: TA6 file open in TaxAct 2016
